attributes.founder: '''Hammerhorn''' is a castle located in Great Wyk, the largest of the Iron Islands. It serves as the seat of House Goodbrother and lies in the Hardstone Hills.<ref>Season 2 bluray: War of the Five Kings</ref>==In the books==In the ''A Song of Ice and Fire'' novels, Hammerhorn is the seat of the main line of House Goodbrother. It is a large, square castle. The stones used for its construction were quarried from the cliff behind it. Below its main entrance lie the openings to the mines and caves that the thralls in service to House Goodbrother toil in.==See also==* AWOIAF (spoilers from the books)==References==reflistIron IslandsCategory:CastlesCategory:Locations in the Iron IslandsCategory:Locations
attributes.title: Hammerhorn

'''Hammerhorn''' is a castle located in [[Great Wyk]], the largest of the [[Iron Islands]]. It serves as the seat of [[House Goodbrother]] and lies in the [[Hardstone Hills]].<ref>Season 2 bluray: War of the Five Kings</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Hammerhorn is the seat of the main line of House Goodbrother. It is a large, square castle. The stones used for its construction were quarried from the cliff behind it. Below its main entrance lie the openings to the mines and caves that the thralls in service to House Goodbrother toil in.
